name: VERBALISMS Magazine Issue #1P (Digital)
description: Did you miss out on the debut issue of VERBALISMS Magazine? Well now you can download the full issue in PDF format. Read it. Print it. Share it. VERBALISMS Issue One+P. The Women’s History Month Special Edition. Interviews with and artwork by hip-hop’s female culture drivers including Flo Brown, Siloette, Ladybug Mecca, Jehmu Greene, Kandia Crazy Horse, Psalm One, Zenobia Simmons, Harriet’s Alter Ego, Estelle, Shystie and MORE. No tits. no ass. Just women representing hip-hop. Lovely.
